channel.title: Blogs on MetaLoom
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on MetaLoom

item.title: Day4 - Vert.x jOOQ PoC
item.description: Intro In this post I want to present a reactive database layer proof of concept implementation I did which will hopefully make its way into my MetaLoom project.

item.title: Day3 - Vert.x Dagger PoC
item.description: Dagger / Vert.x In this post I want to show a proof of concept project that makes use of Eclipse Vert.

item.title: Day2 - Project Setup
item.description: Disclaimer Coke vs. Sprite Ketchup vs. Majo Eclipse vs. IntelliJ

item.title: Day1 - Project Design
item.description: Basics For Loom I knew what kind of building blocks were required since it is basically just a continuation of my work on Mesh.

item.title: Day0 - Let there be Loom
item.description: What is Loom? Loom is a headless media asset management server platform. It provides tools to inventory your media assets and extract the most information from them.
